name: Adventures of Sol and Luna
description:
Sol and Luna are best friends.

At the start of every day/night, Sol and Luna wake up on the ground.

Help them help each other get back into the skies and brighten the world.

Controls:

     A/D or arrow keys to move

     W or Up or Space to jump

Credits:

Programmers Andy Bae,
Jinseo Hong,
Zach WaymanArtistsPaul Denton

Made as a part of Weekly Game Jam
-  Week 56 'Synchronized'
